overview:
Ian Jefferson has been a leader in the world of broadband video for nearly 20 years, in both the cable and telecommunications industries. His record includes substantial international experience with work in North America, Europe, and Asia, and he brings considerable industry domain knowledge to GridNetworks. Jefferson previously held senior positions at Entone, NYNEX, DIVA, and Terayon. He has worked with all major US MSOs and was involved in the very early stages of telco video deployments. Jefferson attended Sussex University UK.

via: GridNetworks
